body:
- Registering package: GreenFlux

<!-- BEGIN RELEASE NOTES -->
> Framework that allows monitoring the power draw from CPU, GPU's and DDR3-RAM in kWh and approximate the number of non-embedding Floating Point operations that a Flux model will make
<!-- END RELEASE NOTES -->
title: New package: GreenFlux v0.1.0
